statements: UPDATE RecyclingCenterInventory SET MaterialQuantity = 100 WHERE MaterialID = 1;

UPDATE RecyclingCenterInventory SET MaterialQuantity = 50, MaterialType = 'Glass' WHERE MaterialID = 1;
UPDATE RecyclingCenterInventory SET MaterialQuantity = 1000 WHERE MaterialType = 'Plastic' AND MaterialID = 2;
UPDATE Materials SET material_name = 'Wood', material_type = 'Natural' WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE Materials SET material_name = 'Wood' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE glass SET location = 'A1' WHERE glass_id = 1;
UPDATE plastic SET color = 'Blue', quantity = 50 WHERE plastic_id = 2;
UPDATE glass SET quantity = 20, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE glass_id = 1;
UPDATE plastic SET color = 'Blue', weight = 15.75, quantity = 50 WHERE plastic_id = 3;

UPDATE Plastic SET plastic_type = 'PET' WHERE plastic_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, material_id = 1 WHERE inventory_id = 1;

UPDATE glass_materials SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE glass_materials SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE glass_type = 'Recycled Glass';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE material_id = 1 AND quantity > 0;
